This function checks if a player is online. <br>

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">bool isPlayerOnline( string playerToCheck )</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
* '''playerToCheck''': The players name to check.

===Returns===
Returns true if player is online else false.

==Code==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function isPlayerOnline ( name )  
    if isElement(getPlayerFromName(name)) then
        return true
    end
    return false
end
</syntaxhighlight>
